actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Courts, the Internet, and Intellectual Property

official_title: To provide that the inferior courts of the United States do not have jurisdiction to hear abortion-related cases.

summary.text: Life-Protecting Judicial Limitation Act of 2001 - Amends the Federal judicial code to deny the district courts of the United States, the District Court of Guam, the District Court of the Virgin Islands, the District Court for the Northern Mariana Islands, and the U.S. Court of Federal Claims jurisdiction to hear or determine any abortion-related case.

titles.title: To provide that the inferior courts of the United States do not have jurisdiction to hear abortion-related cases.
